question: Which personas have shared insights on emerging technologies in their LinkedIn posts while being affiliated with organizations that frequently sign deals with cloud providers?

subtasks.task: Identify LinkedIn posts that share insights on emerging technologies. [PersonaLinkedinPost]
Find personas affiliated with organizations that frequently sign deals with cloud providers. [CompanyDealMaster, PersonaUser]
Match the personas with their LinkedIn posts to compile a list of relevant insights. [PersonaLinkedinPost]
